config.touhou_little_maid_addon.chair.be: This can make the berry farm task enabled or not.
config.touhou_little_maid_addon.chair.fr: This can make the fruit farm task enabled or not.
config.touhou_little_maid_addon.task.ser: This can make the sereneseasons farm task enabled or not.
config.touhou_little_maid_addon.melon_st:
These entries configure the melon stem list
rule: §emelon_item_id§c,§eattached_melon_stem_block_id
Eg: §eminecraft:melon§c,§eminecraft:attached_melon_stem
config.touhou_little_maid_addon.render.l: Maid can render let's do Banner.
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dkb_cookin: Maid can cook food by use the let's do bakery cooking pot
Maid can cook food by use the let's do bakery stove
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dbp_mini_f: Maid can cook food by use the let's do beachparty mini fridge
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dbp_tiki_b: Maid can cook food by use the let's do beachparty tiki bar
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.bnc_key.de: Maid can cook food by use the brewin' and chewin' key
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dcl_cookin: Maid can cook food by use the let's do candlelight cooking pot
Maid can cook food by use the let's do candlelight cooking pan
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.fd_cooking: Maid can cook food by use the farmer's delight cooking pot
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dhb_cauldr: Maid can cook food by use the the herbalbrews cauldron
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dhb_tea_ke: Maid can cook food by use the herbalbrews tea kettle
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.md_copper_: Maid can cook food by use the miner's delight copper pot
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.dv_ferment: Maid can cook food by use the let's do Wine fermentation barrel
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.yhc_moka_p: Maid can cook food by use the youkai's homecoming moka pot
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.compat_mel: Maid will harvest vanilla and other mods melon, need to configer
Mainhand holds a silk touch tool causes the melon itself to drop
task.touhou_little_maid_addon.furnace.de: Maid will cook food or blast ores ect
overlay.touhou_little_maid_addon.book.ti:
The book will change the working mode to the retrieval start height value of the maid of the fruit
Right-click +1, stealth right-click -1
The search range is 2 blocks up from the starting height
message.touhou_little_maid_addon.book.ma: The value of YOffset must be within the range of -5 to 5
